artist: Artist: Robert Cottingham; Publisher: Parasol Press Ltd., New York
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: detail of train car; purple/orange tones; shows metal ladder UL, wheel in center, letters R, D, G in URC
medium: Color aquatint, lift ground, and spit-bite
provenance: (Parasol Press, New York; sold to Palmer); Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer, Orono, Minn. (until 2014); given to MIA.
title: Rolling Stock, For Trish
